attributes.action: Petition to reduce fuel prices in light of market manipulation allegations
attributes.additional_details: The UK public demands that, after the recent news surrounding the alleged manipulation of markets by oil producers, which affects petrol prices, that petrol is reduced to £1.00 a litre with diesel charged 5p per litre more, and this decrease shall remain in place for 12 months, or until such time consumers have been compensated for both this and the LIBOR scandals.
